verses.verse: Now after <WG3326> these things <WG5023> the Lord <WG2962> appointed <WG322> seventy <WG1440> others <WG2087>, <WG2532> and <WG2532> sent <WG649> them <WG846> two <WG1417> and <WG303> two <WG1417> before <WG4253> his <WG846> face <WG4383> into <WG1519> every <WG3956> city <WG4172> and <WG2532> place <WG5117>, whither3739, 3757 he <WG3195> himself <WG846> was <WG3195> about to come <WG2064>.

and <WG2532> heal <WG2323> the sick <WG772> that are therein <WG846>, and <WG2532> say <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, The kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is come nigh <WG1448> unto <WG1909> you <WG5209>.

Woe <WG3759> unto thee <WG4671>, Chorazin <WG5523>! woe <WG3759> unto thee <WG4671>, Bethsaida <WG966>! for <WG3754> if <WG1487> the mighty works <WG1411> had been done <WG1096> in <WG1722> Tyre <WG5184> and <WG2532> Sidon <WG4605>, which were done <WG1096> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>, they would <WG302> have <WG3340> repented <WG3340> long ago <WG3819>, sitting <WG2521> in <WG1722> sackcloth <WG4526> and <WG2532> ashes <WG4700>.

In <WG1722> that <WG846> same hour <WG5610> he <WG2424> rejoiced <WG21> in the Holy Spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, I thank <WG1843> thee <WG4671>, O Father <WG3962>, Lord <WG2962> of heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1093>, that <WG3754> thou didst hide <WG613> these things <WG5023> from <WG575> the wise <WG4680> and <WG2532> understanding <WG4680>, and <WG2532> didst reveal <WG601> them <WG846> unto babes <WG3516>: yea <WG3483>, Father <WG3962>; for <WG3754> so <WG3483> it was <WG1096> well-pleasing <WG2107> in <WG1715> thy <WG4675> sight <WG1715>.

All things <WG3956> have been delivered <WG3860> unto me <WG3427> of <WG5259> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>: and <WG2532> no one <WG3762> knoweth <WG1097> who <WG5101> the Son <WG5207> is <WG2076>, save1487, 3361 the Father <WG3962>; and <WG2532> who <WG5101> the Father <WG3962> is <WG2076>, save1487, 3361 the Son <WG5207>, and <WG2532> he to <WG1437> whomsoever <WG3739> the Son <WG5207> willeth <WG1014> to reveal him <WG601>.

And <WG2532> turning <WG4762> to <WG4314> the disciples <WG3101>, he said2036, 2596 privately <WG2398>, Blessed <WG3107> are the eyes <WG3788> which see <WG991> the things that <WG3739> ye see <WG991>:

for <WG1063> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> many <WG4183> prophets <WG4396> and <WG2532> kings <WG935> desired <WG2309> to see <WG1492> the things which <WG3739> ye <WG5210> see <WG991>, and2532, 1492 saw <WG1492> them not <WG3756>; and <WG2532> to hear <WG191> the things which <WG3739> ye hear <WG191>, and2532, 191 heard <WG191> them not <WG3756>.

And <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, a certain <WG5100> lawyer <WG3544> stood up <WG450> and <WG2532> made trial <WG1598> of him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Teacher <WG1320>, what <WG5101> shall I do <WG4160> to inherit <WG2816> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>?
And he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, What <WG5101> is written <WG1125> in <WG1722> the law <WG3551>? how <WG4459> readest thou <WG314>?

And <WG1161> he <WG2036> answering <WG611> said <WG2036>, Thou shalt love <WG25> the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God <WG2316> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> heart <WG2588>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> soul <WG5590>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> strength <WG2479>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> mind <WG1271>; and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> neighbor <WG4139> as <WG5613> thyself <WG4572>.

<WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> made answer <WG5274> and said <WG2036>, A certain <WG5100> man <WG444> was going down <WG2597> from <WG575> Jerusalem <WG2419> to <WG1519> Jericho <WG2410>; and <WG2532> he fell <WG2007> among <WG4045> robbers <WG3027>, who <WG3739> both <WG2532> stripped <WG1562> him <WG846> and <WG2532> beat <WG4127> him <WG2532>, and departed <WG863>, leaving <WG2007> him half dead <WG5177>.

And <WG1161> by <WG2596> chance <WG4795> a certain <WG5100> priest <WG2409> was going <WG1722> down <WG2597> that <WG1565> way <WG3598>: and <WG2532> when he saw <WG1492> him <WG846>, he passed by on the other side <WG492>.

And <WG1161> in <WG2532> like <WG3668> manner a Levite <WG3019> also <WG1096>, when he came <WG2064> to <WG2596> the place <WG5117>, and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> him <WG492>, passed by on the other side.

But <WG1161> a certain <WG5100> Samaritan <WG4541>, as he journeyed <WG3593>, came <WG2064> where <WG2596> he <WG846> was <WG2596>: and <WG2532> when he saw <WG1492> him <WG846>, he was moved with compassion <WG4697>,

and <WG2532> came to <WG4334> him <WG2611>, and bound up his <WG846> wounds <WG5134>, pouring on <WG2022> them oil <WG1637> and <WG2532> wine <WG3631>; and <WG1161> he set <WG1913> him <WG846> on <WG1909> his own <WG2398> beast <WG2934>, and brought <WG71> him <WG846> to <WG1519> an inn <WG3829>, and <WG2532> took care of <WG1959> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> on <WG1909> the morrow <WG839> he <WG1831> took out <WG1831> two <WG1417> shillings <WG1220>, and gave <WG1325> them to the host <WG3830>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, <WG846> Take care of <WG1959> him <WG846>; and <WG2532> whatsoever5100, Leviticus2 thou spendest more <WG4325>, I <WG302>, when <WG1722> I <WG3165> come back again <WG1880>, will repay <WG591> thee <WG4671>.
Which <WG5101> of <WG3767> these <WG5130> three <WG5140>, thinkest <WG1380> thou <WG4671>, proved <WG1096> neighbor <WG4139> unto him that fell <WG1706> among <WG1519> the robbers <WG3027>?

Now1161, Genesis96 as <WG1722> they <WG846> went <WG4198> on their way <WG2532>, he <WG846> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> a <WG2968> certain <WG5100> village <WG2968>: and <WG1161> a <WG1135> certain <WG5100> woman <WG1135> named <WG3686> Martha <WG3136> received <WG5264> him <WG846> into <WG1519> her <WG846> house <WG3624>.

But <WG1161> the Lord <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> unto her <WG846>, Martha <WG3136>, Martha <WG3136>, thou art anxious <WG3309> and <WG2532> troubled <WG5182> about <WG4012> many things <WG4183>:

but <WG1161> one thing <WG1520> is <WG2076> needful <WG5532>: for <WG1161> Mary <WG3137> hath chosen <WG1586> the <WG3310> good <WG18> part <WG3310>, which <WG3748> shall <WG851> not <WG3756> be taken away <WG851> from <WG575> her <WG846>.
